tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_yield_data ( 
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    season_id INT, 
    crop_name VARCHAR(50), 
    yield_amount DECIMAL(10,2), 
    FOREIGN KEY (season_id) REFERENCES seasons(season_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE yield_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT REFERENCES crops (crop_id),
  season_id INT REFERENCES seasons (season_id),
  yield_amt DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  date_recorded DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE yields (
  yield_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  season_id INT NOT NULL,
  crop_id INT NOT NULL,
  yield_amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (season_id) REFERENCES seasons(season_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crops (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    crop_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    planting_season_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (planting_season_id) REFERENCES seasons(season_id)
);

CREATE TABLE yields (
    yield_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    yield_quantity DOUBLE NOT NULL,
    yield_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_fields (
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    field_id INT NOT NULL,
    planting_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (crop_id, field_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES crops(crop_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES fields(field_id)
);
